ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_areaf | |- area : dom area --> ( 0 [,) +oo ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ffvelrni | |- ( S e. dom area -> ( area ` S ) e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_elrege0 | |- ( ( area ` S ) e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) <-> ( ( area ` S ) e. RR /\ 0 <_ ( area ` S ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_simplbi | |- ( ( area ` S ) e. ( 0 [,) +oo ) -> ( area ` S ) e. RR ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. dom area -> ( area ` S ) e. RR ) |
